The claim that "Corona is not a virus but a bacteria, which is very easy to treat" is false. COVID-19, commonly referred to as "Corona," is caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus, which is a type of coronavirus. It is not a bacterium. Treatment for COVID-19 may include antiviral medications, supportive care, and vaccines to prevent infection.
